text: E23 Cooling fault: Verify pump voltage (22–26V) and LED status. If LED red, check power board connector X3.
If pump voltage below 22V, trace 24V line continuity from PWR-BD CN5 to pump inlet.
Gantry not rotating. Check rotation interlock signal and verify encoder feedback pulses (>3V).
Low helium pressure warning. Verify cryogenic pump temperature (expected < 5K) and compressor current draw (3–5A).
Gradient overheat protection active. Confirm water flow rate > 5 L/min and inlet temperature < 25°C.
Detector calibration failed. Check PMT high voltage (HV) 850–900V and dark current < 2µA.
Probe not detected. Reseat probe connector and verify port voltage 4.8–5.2V.
Image noisy or distorted. Run probe self-test; expected SNR > 30dB.
Exposure aborted. Check kVp setting (expected 70–120kVp) and verify filament current continuity.
Detector communication error. Verify network link light and reinitialize DICOM service.
